SEARCH
Package src.team

Class Statistics

java.lang.Object
src.team.Statistics
Direct Known Subclasses:
Athlete
public class Statistics extends Object
Represents the statistics of an athlete, including offence, defence, agility, and overall stat.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Statistics(int offence, int defence, int agility)
    Creates a new instance of the Statistics class with the specified offensive, defensive, and agility stats.

  • Constructor Details

    • Statistics

      public Statistics(int offence, int defence, int agility)
      Creates a new instance of the Statistics class with the specified offensive, defensive, and agility stats.
      Parameters:
      offence - the offensive stat of the athlete
      defence - the defensive stat of the athlete
      agility - the agility stat of the athlete

  • Method Details

    • getStatList

      public ArrayList<Integer> getStatList()
      Gets a list of the athlete's offensive, defensive, and agility stats.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing the offensive, defensive, and agility stats in that order

    • overallStat

      public int overallStat()
      Calculates and returns the overall stat of the athlete.
      Returns:
      the overall stat

    • updateOverallStat

      public void updateOverallStat()
      Updates the overall stat of the athlete based on the current offensive, defensive, and agility stats.

    • alterStat

      public void alterStat(String stat, int amount)
      Alters the specified stat of the athlete by the given amount.
      Parameters:
      stat - the stat to alter ("Offence", "Defence", "Agility", or "All")
      amount - the amount by which to alter the stat

    • setStat

      public void setStat(String stat, int value)
      Sets the specified stat of the athlete to the given value.
      Parameters:
      stat - the stat to set ("Offence", "Defence", or "Agility")
      value - the value to set for the stat
